Package observers

Interface ConnectionObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
Client, GameBoardController, GameChatController, GameController, MenuBarController, Network, PlayerAreaController, Server
public interface ConnectionObserver
Observer interface for Client and Server connection
Author:
Kevin Mosekjaer
